ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(BEGINS(WhatId, '006')), OR(TEXT(Type)= 'General', TEXT(Type)= 'QBR Follow up', TEXT(Type)= 'FastKey Renewal Risk - Usage Low', TEXT(Type)= 'FastKey Renewal Risk - Senior Influencer / Decision Maker not engaged', TEXT(Type)= 'FastKey Renewal Risk - Key Stakeholder Departed', TEXT(Type)= 'FastKey Renewal Risk - Considering alternatives', TEXT(Type)= 'FastKey Renewal Risk - Group platform being considered'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to update Type field for this record.
